_guide: This file contains default settings for LoRa Transceiver GUI
_guide_post_mode: time: Periodic POST (every 10 sec), lora: POST only on LoRa receive
_guide_wifi_enabled: true: WiFi checkbox checked by default
_guide_status_enabled: false: Status sending disabled by default
_guide_log_short: true: Short log mode (filter non-LoRa messages)
